title: ZeroNet is Awesome
description:
A zite dedicated to sharing interesting ZeroNet zites.
[Contact me here](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit/?to=raf)

post.title: ZeroNet is Awesome #1 - Snake Game
post.body:
The first zite I am going to showcase is [Snake Game](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JsJ1JitaLboc8pvo4fxh9dvP8mt6toPrE), which is an HTML5 version of the game Snake. 
Use your arrow keys to control the snake and collect dots to make him longer. Watch out for the walls and yourself as crashing into one of them results in a game over.
 I really like the simplicity of this version. The sound effects and music are addictive and crisp. 
[Check out Snake Game now!](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JsJ1JitaLboc8pvo4fxh9dvP8mt6toPrE)

Please consider supporting ZeroNet is Awesome by becoming a peer.

post.title: Welcome to ZeroNet is Awesome!
post.body:
Welcome ZeroNet user to ZeroNet is Awesome, a zite dedicated to promoting interesting ZeroNet sites. I will be updating this blog when I find interesting zites to share. 
Please consider supporting ZeroNet is Awesome by becoming a peer. Thank you :) -Raf
